thread.title: Bristow Group Announces Fiscal Year 2016 Second Quarter Earnings Release and Conference Call Schedule
thread.title_full: Bristow Group Announces Fiscal Year 2016 Second Quarter Earnings Release and Conference Call Schedule - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Bristow Group Announces Fiscal Year 2016 Second Quarter Earnings Release and Conference Call Schedule
text:
Bristow Group Inc.
HOUSTON , Oct. 9, Bristow Group Inc. (NYSE: BRS), the leading provider of helicopter services to the offshore energy industry, announced today it will release financial results for its fiscal year 2016 second quarter ended September 30, 2015 , after the market closes on Thursday, November 5 , 2015. In conjunction with the release, Bristow has scheduled a conference call, which will be broadcast live over the Internet on Friday, November 6, 2015 , starting at 10:00 a.m. EST ( 9:00 a.m. CST ). Investors may participate in the call either by phone or audio webcast.
By Phone :
Dial 1-877-404-9648 for domestic callers or 412-902-0030 for international callers at least 10 minutes before the call. A telephone replay will be available through November 13, 2015 by dialing 1-877-660-6853 for domestic callers or 201-612-7415 for international callers, using passcode 13621436#.
By Webcast :
Visit the Investor Relations page of Bristow's website at www.bristowgroup.com. Please log on at least 10 minutes in advance to register and download any necessary software. A replay will be available shortly after the call and will be accessible for approximately 90 days.
ABOUT BRISTOW GROUP INC.
Bristow Group Inc. is the leading provider of helicopter services to the worldwide offshore energy industry based on the number of aircraft operated and one of two helicopter service providers to the offshore energy industry with global operations. The Company has major transportation operations in the North Sea, Nigeria and the U.S. Gulf of Mexico , and in most of the other major offshore oil and gas producing regions of the world, including Australia , Brazil , Canada , Russia and Trinidad . For more information, visit the Company's website at www.bristowgroup.com .
Contact:
Linda McNeill
Investor Relations
(713) 267-7622
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/bristow-group-announces-fiscal-year-2016-second-quarter-earnings-release-and-conference-call-schedule-300157176.html
